org.locationtech.geowave.adapter.vector.query.aggregation

Class FieldMathAggregation<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.adapter.vector.query.aggregation.FieldMathAggregation<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistable, Aggregation<FieldNameParam,BigDecimal,T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FieldMaxAggregation, FieldMinAggregation, FieldSumAggregation

    public abstract class FieldMathAggregation<T>
extends Object
implements Aggregation<FieldNameParam,BigDecimal,T>
    Base aggregation class for performing math operations on numeric attributes. It uses BigDecimal due to it being the most precise numeric attribute possible.

      • getResult

        public BigDecimal getResult()
        Description copied from interface: Aggregation
        Get the current result of the aggregation. This must be mergeable and it is the responsibility of the caller to merge separate results if desired. It is the responsibility of the aggregation to start with a new instance of the result at the beginning of any aggregation.
        Specified by:
        getResult in interface Aggregation<FieldNameParam,BigDecimal,T>
        Returns:
        the current result of the aggregation
